We may wish to contact you again for further feedback. Would you be open to this?

Thank you - please press submit (below) to send your feedback and have your chance to win one of six £50 Amazon vouchers.  In addition - we are looking for a select number of people to take part in an exciting face-to-face event in central London at the end of November. If selected, you would join a small group of customers and the Deliveroo team for a 2-hour evening of food and conversation exploring your recent experiences with Family Dinneroo. Everyone who is selected and attends will receive an incentive of £100 If you are interested, please add your phone-number below. We will then pass this on (along with your name and email) to ResearchBods who are setting up the event.

If selected, you would join a small group of customers and the Deliveroo team for a 2-hour evening of food and conversation exploring your recent experiences with Family Dinneroo. Everyone who is selected and attends will receive an incentive of £100 If you are interested, please add your phone-number below.
